reviewText: One of the most sought after videos by collectors, it is a story about a teen girl who seduces her teacher; There are some provocative scenes in the video. I got wind of it by seeing it in a guide here on Amazon titled The Definitive Guide To Girls In Coming Of Age Movies 2015. http://www.amazon.com/Definitive-Guide-Girls-Coming-Movies-ebook/dp/B00OWC4AIA/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1424022075&sr=8-2&keywords=The+definitive+guide+to+girls+in+coming+of+age+movies

The loose format reminded me of Blair Witch.  The film was choppy and the sound quality was horrible.  I wish I would have noticed that it is black and white before I purchased it.

The movie opens with a few photos of adolescent girls, including one with a clear genital shot bordering on pornographic.  The main character is a 14-year old girl portrayed by an actress clearly over 18.  The only thing immature about this girl is her acting ability and the script.

My girlfriend thought the movie accurately portrayed the insecurity and lack of self-confidence most 14 year old girls feel about themselves and there bodies.  Maybe if the actress at least appeared to be 14?  Maybe not.
Compelling and unsettling story.  One gets the feeling that Montgomery reveals only about 80% of her thinking, possibly because she hasn't formed final opinions yet.
Sit back and be ready to be blown away. Will make you think. You will never see people in the same way!!
